title: CLIENT - NEW PROJECT ICONS/BOXES
body: My friend sent me the Icons as gifts that he purchased with RP, I received the icons but didn't get the boxes it comes with.

replies.body: The project cache bundles or icons are not currently eligible gifts, but we'd be happy to look into your specific issue individually to see what's going on.  Hit us up in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll dig deeper.  We prefer not to discuss account sensitive information on the boards, so any additional information in your ticket such as the gifter could help a lot.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
